prefixes.description: Set of prefixes (to be used in SPARQL queries)

values.value:
PREFIX :         <http://www.example.com/myDataGraph#>
 PREFIX owl:      <http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#>
 PREFIX xsd:      <http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#>
 PREFIX rdfs:     <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>
 PREFIX rdf:      <http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#>
 PREFIX foaf:     <http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/>
 PREFIX dc:       <http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/>
 PREFIX dbr:      <http://dbpedia.org/resource/>
 PREFIX dbp:      <http://dbpedia.org/property/>
 PREFIX dbpedia:  <http://dbpedia.org/>
 PREFIX skos:     <http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#>
 PREFIX dbo:      <http://dbpedia.org/ontology/>
 PREFIX ex:       <http://example.org/demo#> 
 PREFIX sp:       <http://spinrdf.org/sp#> 
 PREFIX sh:       <http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#> 
 PREFIX dct:      <http://purl.org/dc/terms/> 
 PREFIX psh:      <http://ns.inria.fr/probabilistic-shacl/>

grammar.description: BNF Grammar to be used for candidate generation

values.value:
# Set of productions for generating Axioms: SubClassOf(Class, Class)
# Extracted and adapted from the complete grammar of the functional-style syntax defined in
# http://www.w3.org/TR/2012/REC-owl2-syntax-20121211/
Axiom := ClassAxiom
ClassAxiom := SubClassOf
SubClassOf := 'SubClassOf' '(' Class ' ' Class ')'
#---------------------------------------------------------------
Class := '[sparql] ?Class a owl:Class .'

# Set of productions for generating Axioms: SubClassOf(subClassExpression, superClassExpression)
# Extracted and adapted from the complete grammar of the functional-style syntax defined in
# http://www.w3.org/TR/2012/REC-owl2-syntax-20121211/
Axiom := ClassAxiom
ClassAxiom := SubClassOf
SubClassOf := 'SubClassOf' '(' subClassExpression ' ' superClassExpression ')'
#---------------------------------------------------------------
subClassExpression := ObjectSomeValuesFrom | ObjectAllValuesFrom | ObjectIntersectionOf | Class
superClassExpression := ObjectSomeValuesFrom | ObjectAllValuesFrom | ObjectIntersectionOf | Class
#---------------------------------------------------------------
ObjectIntersectionOf := 'ObjectIntersectionOf' '(' Class ' ' Class ')'
ObjectSomeValuesFrom := 'ObjectSomeValuesFrom' '(' Property ' ' Class ')'
ObjectAllValuesFrom := 'ObjectAllValuesFrom' '(' Property ' ' Class ')'
#---------------------------------------------------------------
Class := '[sparql] ?Class a owl:Class .'
Property := '[sparql] ?s ?Property ?o . FILTER ( isIRI(?o) ) .'

# Set of productions for generating Axioms: DisjointClass(Class, Class)
# Extracted and adapted from the complete grammar of the functional-style syntax defined in# http://www.w3.org/TR/2012/REC-owl2-syntax-20121211/
Axiom := ClassAxiom
ClassAxiom := DisjointClasses
DisjointClasses := 'DisjointClasses' '(' Class ' ' Class ')'
#--------------------------------------------------------------
Class := '[sparql] ?Class a owl:Class .'

# Set of productions for generating Axioms: DisjointClass(ClassExpression, ClassExpression)
# Extracted and adapted from the complete grammar of the functional-style syntax defined in
# http://www.w3.org/TR/2012/REC-owl2-syntax-20121211/
Axiom := ClassAxiom
ClassAxiom := DisjointClasses
DisjointClasses := 'DisjointClasses' '(' ClassExpression ' ' ClassExpression ')'
#---------------------------------------------------------------
ClassExpression := ObjectSomeValuesFrom | ObjectAllValuesFrom | ObjectIntersectionOf | Class
#--------------------------------------------------------------
ObjectIntersectionOf := 'ObjectIntersectionOf' '(' Class ' ' Class ')'
ObjectSomeValuesFrom := 'ObjectSomeValuesFrom' '(' Property ' ' Class ')'
ObjectAllValuesFrom := 'ObjectAllValuesFrom' '(' Property ' ' Class ')'
#--------------------------------------------------------------
Class := '[sparql] ?Class a owl:Class .'
Property := '[sparql] ?s ?Property ?o . FILTER ( isIRI(?o) ) .'

# RDFMiner v1.4
# Test of SHACL Shapes generation v1.0
# Example:
#   a sh:NodeShape ;
#   sh:targetClass Class ;
#   sh:property [ sh:path rdf:type ; sh:hasValue Class ; ] .
#   The subject of the given shape will be generate randomly using Java code
#---------------------------------------------------------------
Shape := ' a ' NodeShape
NodeShape := 'sh:NodeShape ; ' ShapeBody
ShapeBody := 'sh:targetClass ' Class ' ; ' ShapeProperty
ShapeProperty := ' sh:property [ ' PropertyBody ' ] . '
PropertyBody := ' sh:path rdf:type ; sh:hasValue ' Class ' ; '
#---------------------------------------------------------------
Class := '[sparql] ?x a ?Class .'

# SHACL Shapes generation v1.0 based on SHACL W3C Recommandation : https://www.w3.org/TR/shacl/
# The subject of the given shape will be generate randomly using Java code
Shape := ' a ' NodeShape
NodeShape := 'sh:NodeShape ; ' ShapeBody
#---------------------------------------------------------------
ShapeBody := ClassTarget | SubjectsOfTarget | ObjectsOfTarget # | NodeTarget
# In this version, because 'NodeTarget' will consider only one triple. It is not yet considered (until multi-node target)
# But you can choose to enable it by uncommenting the line below and the rule above
# NodeTarget := 'sh:targetNode ' Node ' ; ' ShapeProperty
ClassTarget := 'sh:targetClass ' Class ' ; ' ShapeProperty
SubjectsOfTarget := 'sh:targetSubjectsOf ' Property ' ; ' ShapeProperty
# Here, we will directly target the objects using ObjectsOfTarget, as a consequence we will specify the ValueTypeConstraintComponent fragment
ObjectsOfTarget := 'sh:targetObjectsOf ' Property ' ; ' ValueTypeConstraintComponent ' . '
#---------------------------------------------------------------
# Value type Constraint Components
#---------------------------------------------------------------
ShapeProperty := 'sh:property [ ' PropertyBody ' ] . '
PropertyBody := 'sh:path ' Property ' ; ' ValueTypeConstraintComponent ' ; '
# 
ValueTypeConstraintComponent := ClassConstraint | DatatypeConstraint | NodeKindConstraint
# Constraint Component IRI: sh:ClassConstraintComponent
# The condition specified by sh:class is that each value node is a SHACL instance of a given type.
ClassConstraint := 'sh:class ' Class
# Constraint Component IRI: sh:DatatypeConstraintComponent
# sh:datatype specifies a condition to be satisfied with regards to the datatype of each value node.
DatatypeConstraint := 'sh:datatype ' DataType
# Constraint Component IRI: sh:NodeKindConstraintComponent
# sh:nodeKind specifies a condition to be satisfied by the RDF node kind of each value node.
NodeKindConstraint := 'sh:nodeKind ' NodeKind
# It can be: sh:BlankNode, sh:IRI, sh:Literal sh:BlankNodeOrIRI, sh:BlankNodeOrLiteral and sh:IRIOrLiteral
NodeKind := 'sh:BlankNode' | 'sh:IRI' | 'sh:Literal' | 'sh:BlankNodeOrIRI' | 'sh:BlankNodeOrLiteral' | 'sh:IRIOrLiteral'
# sh:hasValue ' Class ' ; '
Class := '[sparql] ?x a ?Class .'
Property := '[sparql] ?subj ?Property ?obj . FILTER ( isIRI(?Property) ) .'
DataType := '[sparql] { SELECT distinct ?o WHERE { ?s ?p ?o . FILTER ( isLiteral(?o) ) } } BIND( datatype(?o) as ?DataType ) .'

trainSparqlEndpoint.description: SPARQL endpoint (which contains the training dataset)

targetSparqlEndpoint.description: SPARQL endpoint (which contains the entire dataset)

timeCap.description: Timec-cap for OWL axioms assessment (in min.)

novelty.description: Novelty Search (Experimental: only for SubClassOf axioms)

shaclAlpha.description: value of alpha for SHACL probabilistic mode (Hypothesis testing)

shaclProb.description: the value of p for SHACL probabilistic mode
